item.title: Book Notes: The Phoenix Project
item.author: contact@dougiepeart.co.uk (Dougie Peart)
item.description: State “DONE” from “NEXT” [2022-12-30 Fri 15:43] Source Author: Gene Kim Title: The Phoenix Project Year: 2013 Genre: Technology Rating: 8/10 The Book in 3 Sentences If you were to take over a traditional IT organisation weighed down with decades of technical debt, how could you turn things around? Bill Palmer is the new reluctant VP of IT operations and he needs to figure this out for himself before his company goes under.
item.dc:creator: [Dougie Peart]
